entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
